mapper.sql: SELECT A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.PRJT_SN , A.PRJT_TEAM_SN , A.PRJT_TEAM_NM , NVL(A.TEAM_SCORE,0) AS TEAM_SCORE , A.REG_NO , A.REG_DTTM , A.MOD_NO , A.MOD_DTTM , NVL((SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(C.USER_NO) FROM TB_LEC_PRJT_TEAM_MBR B, TB_STD_STD C WHERE B.STD_NO = C.STD_NO AND B.CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND B.PRJT_SN = A.PRJT_SN AND B.PRJT_TEAM_SN = A.PRJT_TEAM_SN AND B.TEAM_LEADER_DIV = 'Y') ,'팀장없음') TEAM_LEADER ,(SELECT FN_GET_USER_ID(C.USER_NO) FROM TB_LEC_PRJT_TEAM_MBR B, TB_STD_STD C WHERE B.STD_NO = C.STD_NO AND B.CRS_CRE_CD = A.CRS_CRE_CD AND B.PRJT_SN = A.PRJT_SN AND B.PRJT_TEAM_SN = A.PRJT_TEAM_SN AND B.TEAM_LEADER_DIV = 'Y' ) LEADER_ID FROM TB_LEC_PRJT_TEAM A
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_LEC_PRJT_TEAM SET TEAM_SCORE = #{teamScore} , MOD_NO = #{modNo} , MOD_DTTM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND PRJT_SN = #{prjtSn} AND PRJT_TEAM_SN = #{prjtTeamSn}

UPDATE TB_LEC_PRJT_TEAM_MBR SET MBR_SCORE = #{teamScore} , MOD_DTTM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , MOD_NO = #{modNo} WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND PRJT_SN = #{prjtSn} AND PRJT_TEAM_SN = #{prjtTeamSn}
mapper.select: SELECT A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.PRJT_MBR_SN , A.PRJT_TEAM_SN , A.STD_NO , NVL(A.MBR_SCORE ,0) AS MBR_SCORE , A.MBR_ROLE , B.USER_NO ,(SELECT FN_GET_USER_NAME(B.USER_NO) FROM DUAL) AS TEAM_LEADER ,(SELECT FN_GET_USER_ID(B.USER_NO) FROM DUAL) AS LEADER_ID FROM TB_LEC_PRJT_TEAM_MBR A, TB_STD_STD B WHERE A.CRS_CRE_CD = B.CRS_CRE_CD AND A.STD_NO = B.STD_NO AND A.PRJT_SN = #{prjtSn} AND A.PRJT_TEAM_SN = #{prjtTeamSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_LEC_PRJT_TEAM_MBR SET MBR_SCORE = #{mbrScore} , MOD_DTTM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND PRJT_SN = #{prjtSn} AND PRJT_TEAM_SN = #{prjtTeamSn} AND PRJT_MBR_SN = #{prjtMbrSn}
mapper.select: SELECT A.CRS_CRE_CD , A.PRJT_SN , A.ASMT_SN , A.ASMT_TITLE , FN_GET_DATE_FORMAT(ASMT_END_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') ASMT_START_DTTM , FN_GET_DATE_FORMAT(ASMT_END_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI') ASMT_END_DTTM , A.ASMT_CTS FROM TB_LEC_PRJT_ASMT A WHERE A.CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND A.PRJT_SN = #{prjtSn} AND A.ASMT_END_DTTM > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

SELECT A.SEND_CTS ,A.ASMT_SN ,(SELECT PRJT_TEAM_NM FROM TB_LEC_PRJT_TEAM B WHERE B.CRS_CRE_CD = #{crsCreCd} AND B.PRJT_SN = #{prjtSn} AND B.PRJT_TEAM_SN = #{prjtTeamSn} ) AS PRJT_TEAM_NM FROM TB_LEC_PRJT_ASMT_SEND A WHERE A.ASMT_SN = #{asmtSn} AND A.PRJT_SN = #{prjtSn} AND A.PRJT_TEAM_SN = #{prjtTeamSn}
